data.partBlankContent: The prison was a dark and unhappy place. The wa___ were th___ and di___, a__ there we__ barely a__ windows. Inside, there w__ no decor_____ of a__ kind, and th___ was a bad sm___ in t__ air. There was a small yard for exercise, but it didn't have any grass or plants.
data.fullContent: The prison was a dark and unhappy place. The walls were thick and dirty, and there were barely any windows. Inside, there was no decoration of any kind, and there was a bad smell in the air. There was a small yard for exercise, but it didn't have any grass or plants.
data.answer: 监狱是一个黑暗和不幸的地方。壁厚和脏,还有几乎没有窗户。里面,没有任何装饰,和空气中的臭味。有一个小院子里锻炼,但没有任何草或植物。
